text: Ronald Reagan (1911–2004) was the 40th President of the United States. Reagan may also refer to: ==Places== ===United States=== * Reagan, Indiana * Reagan, Henderson County, Tennessee * Reagan, McMinn County, Tennessee * Reagan, Texas * Reagan County, Texas ==Other uses== * Reagan (given name), a given name and list of people with the given name * Reagan (surname), a surname and list of people with the surname * Reagan (film), a 2011 American documentary film * Reagan (EP), an EP by Whirlwind Heat * "Reagan", track from Killer Mike's album R.A.P. Music ==See also== * Emperor Reigen * List of things named after Ronald Reagan * Raygun (disambiguation) * The Reagan Diaries, an edited version of diaries written by Ronald Reagan * Regan (disambiguation) * Ronald Reagan (disambiguation) *
title: Reagan (disambiguation)
